Product Details

Master Chief’s entire story, only on Xbox One.

Get the essential Halo experience with the Xbox One Halo: The Master Chief Collection Bundle, honoring the iconic hero and his epic journey. The bundle includes The Master Chief’s entire story with Halo Combat Evolved: Anniversary, newly remastered Halo 2: Anniversary, Halo 3, and Halo 4. productList.productName: Microsoft Xbox One Gaming Console Kit with Destiny + Forza Motorsport 5
productList.productDescription:
The Xbox One normally doesn't come with a game so you'll usually have to buy it separately. Fortunately, this Xbox One kit includes a copy of Destiny. From the creators of Halo and the company that brought you Call of Duty, you play as a Guardian of the last city on Earth, who can wield incredible power. Explore the ancient ruins of the solar system, from the red dunes of Mars to the lush jungles of Venus. Defeat Earth's enemies. Reclaim what has been lost and become a legend. Personalize and upgrade every aspect of how you look and fight with a nearly limitless combination of armor, weapons, and visual customizations. Take your upgraded character into every mode, including campaign, cooperative, social, public, and competitive multiplayer.


Destiny is rated T for Teen for:
Animated Blood
Violence


Please note that the Xbox One included in this kit does not come with the Kinect sensor.


PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • AMD Radeon Graphics Core Next Engine

  • Custom 8-Core x86 AMD Processor

  • 8GB of RAM + 32MB of ESRAM

  • 10/100/1000 Mbps Gigabit Ethernet

  • 11n Wi-Fi

  • Blu-ray Optical Drive

  • Xbox SmartGlass Support

  • Xbox One Controller Included

  • Xbox Live Gold Subscription Support

  • Destiny Game Included


 


The Xbox One Gaming Console with Forza Motorsport 5 Game Download from Microsoft delivers a next generation experience in both gaming and multimedia. With high resolution graphics and fast performance, the Xbox One allows you to game on your own terms. You can snap two windows together on the same screen so you can watch TV while you play your game. Xbox Live allows you to test your skills against other players around the world. Xbox Smartglass allows you to connect your smartphone or tablet to your Xbox One for intuitive access and control. The redesigned Xbox One controller provides over 40 improvements over its predecessor, the Xbox 360 controller. The Xbox One isn't just a gaming console, it's a multimedia system designed to consolidate all your entertainment needs into one device.


Please note that this Xbox One version does not come with the Kinect sensor.


The Xbox One comes with a download code for Forza Motorsport 5.


Next-Gen Gaming


Eight-Core Performance


The Xbox One has an 8-core processor that lets you instantly switch between a game and your favorite entertainment apps with ease.


HDMI Pass-Thru


Connect your cable or satellite box to your Xbox One and watch your favorite shows with the OneGuide. HDMI pass-thru enables you to watch TV through your Xbox, which makes switching inputs a thing of the past.


Loaded with Memory


With 8GB of RAM and a 500GB hard drive, the Xbox One gives you plenty of memory for your games, demos, movies, apps, music, and more. 

The Xbox One system software uses a significant amount of storage, which means less internal storage will be available to users.


Blu-Ray


Watch movies and play games in stunning HD with the built-in Blu-ray optical drive.


One-of-a-Kind Architecture


Microsoft created a state-of-the-art gaming OS and fused it with a powerful Windows OS. So you get the best of both worlds on the Xbox One. Forget about having to switch inputs to watch TV or play a game. Now you can run a host of apps right alongside your game without any loss of performance.


Peak Performance


The Xbox One balances both power and performance. In addition to Xbox One's architecture, the combination of its CPU, GPU, and ESRAM provides both power and speed in harmony. So the Xbox One uses its power more effectively.


The Xbox One Controller


The Xbox One controller has over 40 technology innovations over its predecessor, the Xbox 360 controller. With Impulse Triggers, you'll experience precise fingertip feed for more realistic encounters. Kinect (sold separately) will auto-pair your controller instantly, even when you hand it to a friend during a game. Microsoft also streamlined the thumbsticks and contours as well as redesigned the infamous D-pad for improved precision and comfort in your hands.


High Resolution Graphics


Immerse yourself in cinematic worlds that look like real life, with characters that feel more human. Advanced AI technology and the processing power of Xbox One make game worlds come alive. And thanks to the power of the cloud, what you do in a game can stay that way persistently. Xbox One's unique architecture allows creators to build realistic, cinematic experiences of the highest fidelity possible.


Always On


The Xbox One was designed for today's fast-paced lifestyle. It wakes up instantly when you say, "Xbox On," and even turns on your TV. Downloads and updates happen behind the scenes, so you can jump right in. And when you need to pause, your games are suspended right where you left off, so you can resume instantly.


Cross Platform


Get more from games and entertainment with unique cross-screen experiences. With the free Xbox SmartGlass app for Windows 8, Windows Phone, Android, and iOS, you can use your tablet or phone to extend, enhance and control what's playing on your Xbox One. Plus, the combination of controller, Kinect and Xbox SmartGlass technologies unlock opportunities for developers to bring you more innovative games.


Xbox Live Multiplayer


Smart Match


Smart Match uses advanced algorithms to pair you with the right players and gives you more control over who you play with.


No Waiting in Lobbies


Tired of waiting around in game lobbies for matches to start? Keep playing, watching TV, or surfing the web while matchmaking happens behind the scenes.


Cloud-Based Power


Games hosted in the cloud on Xbox Live gain performance, neutralize host advantage, and minimize cheating.


Reputation System


Are cheats and jerks ruining your multiplayer experience? An extensive redesigned reputation system helps keep annoying players out of your games.


Reliable Service


Xbox Live ensures next-generation gaming and performance for the millions of gamers around the world. Server based multiplayer experiences come to life with cloud-powered artificial intelligence creating epic experiences each time you play. And because every game is hosted by servers, host advantage, and player drops and ping times should be much improved.


Living Games


Just because you're not playing doesn't mean your games have to stop. With Living Games technology and the power of the cloud, game worlds can be persistent. So the things you do in a game will stay that way. Plus, your games are in sync with the real world, which means the latest stats can be automatically fed into your sports games. Advanced AI even allows your friends to play against your shadow when you're not available.


Suspend and Resume Gameplay Instantly


Sometimes, you'll have to stop playing in the middle of a game. Thanks to the power of the cloud, you can start right where you left off, even if it's in the middle of a battle or a race.


Adaptive Artificial Intelligence


Games can learn to play like you and your friends, so you always have worthy opponents, even when your friends are offline.


Disclaimer


Available features and content may vary by country. Advanced TV hardware required. Games and media content sold separately. Initial set-up and some games and features required broadband internet; ISP fees apply. Online multiplayer, Game DVR, and Upload Studio also require Xbox Live Gold membership (sold separately). Not all Xbox Live features available on Xbox 360 are available on Xbox One; multiplayer between Xbox 360 and Xbox One not supported. Adaptive AI, Game DVR, Living Games, Twitch and Upload Studio available in supported games. Home Gold benefits limited to single Xbox One in Gold member's home; restrictions apply.


Entertainment


Home Screen


Everyone can have their own personalized Home screen, for instant access to their favorite games and entertainment. Plus, sign into Xbox Live on any Xbox One, and your Home screen, digital games, content, profile, and saves come to you.


Split Screen


Xbox One lets you quickly jump from TV to a movie to a game. And then snap them side by side to do two things simultaneously. Music and games. Skype voice calls and live sports. Snap Upload next to the game you are playing to watch clips related to that game.


NFL on Xbox One


Xbox One is changing the game and transforming the way fans experience the NFL from the living room. Stay connected to all the latest NFL news, video highlights, scores, and stats from the around the League, anytime you want. And with built-in NFL.com Fantasy Football, you can even follow your Fantasy updates in real-time while watching live TV broadcast games. Xbox One is the Official Game Console of the NFL.


Skype


Skype has been specially designed for Xbox One. Chat with friends on your TV in stunning HD. Use Skype in Snap mode to chat while you watch TV. Or participate in group video Skype calls with up to three people around the world, all from the comfort of your living room.


Explore the Web


Explore the web on your TV with Internet Explorer for Xbox One. Use your voice to browse your favorite sites with ease. Use Bing to find the best of the web. Or use Xbox SmartGlass on your phone or tablet to control your experience.


Find Popular Shows


Xbox One lets you discover what TV shows and movies are popular among your friends and tells you what's trending in your region.


Xbox Fitness


Experience the intense workouts with instant, personalized feedback on Xbox Fitness. Train with Jillian Michaels, Tracy Anderson, P90X, INSANITY, and more. Get unlimited access free with Xbox Live Gold for a limited time. 

Starting January 2015, unlimited access requires a paid Xbox Fitness Pass subscription and an Xbox Live Gold membership (both sold separately). Additional Xbox Fitness content is available for purchase, and may vary over time.


OneGuide


Connect your cable or satellite box to the Xbox One and watch all your favorite television shows right through your console. The OneGuide has all your favorite channels and all your favorite shows. You can create your own favorites list by selecting the TV channels and apps you watch the most. You no longer have to switch inputs to watch TV or play a movie. You can also control the OneGuide with your voice via the Kinect (sold separately). 

Supported television tuner or cable/satellite set top box with HDMI output and HDMI cable required (all sold separately).


Apps


The Xbox One supports a variety of apps. Pin your favorites to your home screen. You can also jump between apps instantly or snap them side by side to do two things at once.


Available apps and features vary by country. Not all apps will be available at launch. Check the official Xbox One website for more details. Xbox Live Gold membership (sold separately) and/or additional subscriptions or requirements apply for some features (such as Amazon Instant Video, Crackle, Hulu Plus, Skype, Xbox Music, Fox Now, FX Now on Xbox One, CW, Muzu.TV, Target Ticket, TED, Redbox Instant, Twitch and Vudu, Univision Deportes, Internet Explorer, Machinima, and YouTube). Kinect functionality and voice available with select Xbox Live content and varies by feature, provider and region. Xbox Video on Xbox One is streaming only.


HD resolution only available with 1:1 Skype video calls.


Live streams of all the WatchESPN Networks are available at no additional cost to fans who receive ESPN as part of their TV subscription through participating TV providers. Access to live programming on the ESPN3 channel of WatchESPN is available at no additional cost to fans with subscriptions to participating high speed internet service providers. ESPN on Xbox Live requires and Xbox Live Gold membership.


Broadband internet and account on Xbox required. On Xbox One and the Xbox Video website, Xbox Video is streaming only. The Xbox Video website requires Windows 7, 8, 8.1, or Mac OS 10.6.8+ with Safari 5.1+. Content use restrictions apply.

productList.productName: Canon EOS C100 Cinema EOS Camera (Body Only)
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • Super 35mm 8.3MP CMOS Sensor

  • EF Lens Mount with EF Contacts

  • HDMI Outputs an Uncompressed Signal

  • Dual SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Slots

  • ISO 320 to 80,000

  • Wide DR and Canon Log Gamma

  • Reduced Rolling Shutter Skews

  • Built-in ND Filters with Manual Controls

  • Two XLR Audio Connectors

  • Peripheral Illumination Correction


 


The Canon EOS C100 EF Cinema Camera (Body Only) inherits the design concept of the EOS C300, which put DSLR quality video in a groundbreaking form factor with the key features of a more traditional video camera. The C100 has been optimized for run-and-gun and one-man-band style shooting, a specialty of event videographers, documentarians and independent filmmakers. This camera is about 15% smaller than the C300, and yet its 1080p image will hold-up nicely beside that of the more expensive camera. The C100 even has a few features not found in the C300, like One Shot AF, Push Auto Iris, a built-in microphone, and uncompressed HDMI out with superimposed timecode and 2:3 pull down marker.



NEW FEATURES



Dual Pixel CMOS AF Technology

This is an optional upgrade feature that provides enhanced autofocusing, which prevents motion artifacts during rapid talent and pan moves. This features requires your C100 to be sent to an accredited Canon service, where an upgrade will be installed at a cost of $500.

This upgrade provides an Autofocus mode to help ensure sharp focus and smooth focus transitions. It provides a new Continuous AF (Autofocus) function for all autofocus Lenses, using Dual Pixel CMOS AF technology. A new AF Lock setting also lets you change the image framing while holding the desired focus. This feature is ideal for users who regularly shoot with smaller crews, who shoot moving subjects, or who want smoother, more natural-looking autofocus.

Dual Pixel CMOS AF technology features a CMOS sensor that consists of an array of pixels that each feature two separate photodiodes. By continuously comparing their outputs during AF mode, phase-difference autofocus helps ensure non-blurred images and smooth focus transitions even when the talent and/or camera are moving. The new feature places a high priority on maintaining sharp focus while providing a natural, smooth autofocus movement with select Canon EF lenses — including newer-generation STM lenses — which offer even smoother and quieter operation.

This upgrade will have firmware version 2.0.3.1.00, which also includes the Continuous Recording enhancement available with firmware version 1.0.3.1.00.



Continuous Recording Firmware Update

Firmware update version 1.0.3.1.00, available free on Canon's EOS website, provides a continuous, nonstop recording function and the ability to create In and Out points in the footage every time the START/STOP button is pressed. At this time, the continuous recording function is compatible with Grass Valley's EDIUS Pro 7 software.


ALL FEATURES



Super 35mm 8.3MP CMOS Sensor

The C100's Super 35mm-sized sensor provides an angle-of-view and depth of field that equivalent to that of traditional Super 35mm film. With a native resolution of 8.3MP and a wider pixel pitch than conventional professional camcorders, the C100's sensor offers enhanced sensitivity and reduced noise in low light environments.



EF Lens Mount with EF Contacts

The C100 is fully compatible with Canon's renowned EF mount lenses. Even specialty lenses, such as Canon's 24mm f/3.5L II tilt shift lens or the 8-15mm f/4L Ultra-Wide Zoom fisheye lens, are available on the C100. When shooting with EF lenses, C100 features peripheral illumination correction, which automatically compensates for light fall-off in the corners of the image. Furthermore, continuous AF will be available via a firmware update for compatibility with Canon EF Lenses with STM focusing.



HDMI Outputs an Uncompressed Signal

The C100 outputs an uncompressed signal via HDMI. This signal superimposes timecode and the 2:3 pulldown marker, which means an external recorder and converter can process the HDMI output as an SDI signal. External recorders provide an instant back-up and help to streamline post-production workflows.



ISO 320 to 80,000

A maximum ISO of 80,000 allows the C100 to record in low light environments. This is ideal for working with available light. Although higher ISOs always translate into a noisier image, the C100 utilizes the same signal processing as 3-chip RGB systems, which produces a superior image quality.



Dual SDHC/SDXC Card Slots

Secure Digital memory cards offer professional grade read/write speeds and reliability at ever more affordable prices. Dual SDHC/SDXC memory card slots allow the C100 to record simultaneously to two memory cards, creating an instant back-up. What's more, C100 can record HD footage to Slot A while simultaneously recording down-converted SD footage to Slot B.



Wide DR and Canon Log Gamma

Canon Log records an image with subdued contrast and sharpness, which preserves a high dynamic range and presupposes color grading in post production. Wide DR is a new gamma setting based on Rec. 709, which offers a wide dynamic range and smooth gradations in highlights and shadow, without requiring processing in post-production.



Reduced Rolling Shutter Skews

Traditional CMOS sensors scan one line at a time and sometimes produce a rolling shutter skew when shooting fast moving objects or executing a quick pan. The C100's CMOS sensor features the same signal processing as 3-chip RGB systems, which reduces the angle of distortion compared to cameras with regular CMOS sensors of the same size.



Built-in ND Filters with Manual Operation

In excessively bright environments neutral density filters are often required to avoid over exposure, without compromising desirable shutter and aperture settings. The C100 features built-in ND filters in three densities, which make for four ND configurations (OFF, 2 stops, 4 stops, 6 stops). The built-in ND filters are deployed via a manual dial.



Two XLR Audio Connectors

The C100 includes a top mounted handle unit, which features two XLR connectors and a microphone shock mount. XLR connections offer a high quality audio input for professional grade microphones and facilitate 2 channel 48kHz linear PCM (24Mbps) audio recordings.



One Shot AF and Push Auto Iris

One-Shot AF executes focus adjustments with a dedicated button, and the Push Auto Iris button automatically adjusts the aperture of the lens to quickly and easily maintain proper exposure. Both of these functions can be accessed even when operating in manual mode.



Full Manual Control and Focusing Aids

The EOS C100 offers complete manual control of each aspect of the recording process. Create and recall custom picture settings, camera functions, and display options. The camera also features several powerful and intuitive focusing aids in both the EVF and LCD monitor that make it easy to confirm critical focus distance; Peaking Modes and Magnify Focus Modes are available while in standby or while recording. Additionally, the LCD features Edge Monitor Display; green waveforms display the overall focus of the scene and red waveforms provide focus feedback of the three focus check boxes visible on the LCD monitor.
productList.productMetaDescription: The Canon EOS C100 EF Cinema Camera is a awesome group gift idea for anyone transitioning from the world of DSLR's. Great product and price.

productList.productName: Razer Atrox Arcade Stick Gaming Controller for Xbox One
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • For Use with Xbox One Gaming Console

  • Premium Quality Sanwa Components

  • 8 x Tournament-Grade Sanwa Buttons

  • 1 x Precision 8-Way Joystick

  • Internal Storage Compartments

  • One-Touch Access to Internals & Storage

  • Fully Mod Capable Construction

  • 13' Detachable Screw-Lock USB Cable

  • Additional Bat Top Included

  • The Atrox Arcade Stick Gaming Controller for Xbox Onefrom Razer is a gaming controller equipped with eight highly responsive buttons and a precision 8-way joystick for use with the Xbox One video game console. Featuring genuine Sanwa hardware and an ergonomically authentic arcade layout, the controller offers precision and reliability and is made for tournament-grade gaming. The controller is built for modding enthusiasts, as the top panel, the joystick, and the buttons are fully mod capable. For advanced modding, the entire bottom of the internal compartment is a honeycomb structure, for easy screw mounting in every location.

  • Premium Quality Sanwa Hardware Components

  • The Razer Atrox Arcade Stick for Xbox One is, at its core, a tournament-grade fighting machine built to enhance your gaming prowess. Premium quality Sanwa components such as eight highly responsive buttons and a precision 8-way joystick, allow you to strike instantly, game after game, while maintaining peak performance and reliability.

  • Fully Mod Capable Construction

  • This controller is built for modding enthusiasts, with the inside of the platform easily accessible for further modding to your preference. Interchange the top panel with your own designs or even switch the joystick and buttons to suit your play-style. For advanced modding, the entire bottom of the internal compartment is a honeycomb structure, for easy screw mounting in every location.

  • Internal Storage Compartments

  • With the one-touch button, the fully accessible internal compartments of the controller open up and reveal dedicated slots to store the included detachable screw-lock cable for secure connection, a bat top joystick, a screwdriver, as well as space for two extra buttons. Thus, giving you all the room you need when you take your Atrox with you.
productList.productMetaDescription: Razer Atrox Arcade Stick Gaming Controller for Xbox One is the perfect group gift for the gaming enthusiast that will take advantage of modifying this premium game controller for their favorite arcade games.

productList.productName: Samsung 16GB Galaxy Tab S Multi-Touch 10.5&quot; Wi-Fi Tablet (Dazzling White)
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • 5" Super AMOLED Multi-Touch Display

  • WQXGA (2560 x 1600) Native Resolution

  • Samsung Exynos 5 Octa Chipset

  • 3GB of RAM & 16GB of Onboard Storage

  • microSD Expansion Slot

  • Dual-Band Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.0

  • 1MP Front Camera + 8MP Rear Camera

  • Fingerprint Scanner

  • 7900mAh Battery Capacity

  • Android KitKat 4.4


Combine powerful performance and wireless connectivity with the dazzling white 16GB Galaxy Tab S Multi-Touch 10.5" Wi-Fi Tablet from Samsung. This tablet features the Samsung octa-core chipset, which consists of 1.9 GHz and 1.3 GHz quad-core processors, and has 3GB of RAM. This system also has 16GB of built-in storage and adds a microSD slot for additional storage; the microSD slot supports microSDXC cards up to 128GB. For high-speed Internet connectivity, dual-band 802.11a/b/g/n/ac Wi-Fi with MIMO technology is built-in. Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity is also integrated for pairing with other Bluetooth-enabled devices. 

This Samsung Galaxy Tab S features a 10.5" Super AMOLED touchscreen display with a WQXGA 2560 x 1600 native resolution for viewing detailed high-definition content. The onboard front facing 2.1-megapixel and rear 8-megapixel cameras allow you take pictures of yourself and the world around you, the rear camera is also accompanied by an LED flash for capturing images in low-light conditions. There's also a fingerprint reader on the tablet, which allows you to secure the device with the swipe of a finger. An IR blaster is also integrated for using the tablet as a universal remote control for compatible IR devices. 

A Micro-USB 2.0 interface is onboard for mass storage connections and charging the device; a USB cable and charger are included. The internal 7900mAh battery is designed to offer hours of enjoyment before recharging is needed. The Galaxy Tab S comes with the Android KitKat 4.4 operating system, this operation system is designed for fluid and intuitive multi-touch navigation. This device also features GPS with GLONASS, which allows you to use Google's location based services, including turn-by-turn GPS navigation.


Hunger Games Movie Pack App


This tablet includes the Hunger Games Movie Pack app. This app allows you to download the Hunger Games and Hunger Games: Catching Fire films for free from the Google Play store. The app also gives you access to additional movie content.


Multi-Window


Use two compatible apps side-by-side with the ability to drag content from one app to the other.


Multi-User Mode


Get a unique login for a personalized tablet experience for multiple users, supporting up to 8 profiles.


Kids Mode


Provide a secure environment for kids with library of content and entertainment available via the Kids store.


Ultra-Power Saving Mode


Turns your screen to black and white and shuts off nonessential apps so you can maximize battery life when needed.


Hancom Office


Access a full suite of office documents including spreadsheets and presentations.


Smart Switch


Smart Switch is design to make switching devices easy. You can move your contacts, photos and media easily and securely.


Sidesync


Conveniently view and control the screens of compatible smartphones like the Samsung Galaxy S 5 directly on your Galaxy Tab S, so you don't have to put down your tablet while you're working, browsing or watching.


Pre-Installed Applications


Calculator, Calendar, Camera, Contacts, Dropbox, e-Meeting, Email, Flipboard, Gallery, Hancom Viewer, Hancom Office, Help, Internet, Kids Mode, KNOX, Memo, Music, My Files, New York Times, S-Voice, Samsung Apps, Settings, SideSync 3.0, Remote PC, Video, WatchON, S-Voice, World Clock, WebEX


Content and Services



  • WatchON: With the built-in IR blaster, your tablet becomes a remote control for your TV and also provides video-on-demand to easily find your favorite movies and TV shows.

  • Paper Garden: Discover and enjoy visually distinct, interactive top brand magazines in one location.

  • Milk Music: Milk Music is an ad-free radio service that gives access to a library of music content, curated by top DJs and industry professionals, all for free.


Supported Files and Formats


Message



  • Email (POP3/IMAP/SMTP/SSL/TLS)

  • Exchange ActiveSync Email 

    Audio Files:

  • Audio Formats: MP3, M4A ,3GA, AAC, OGG, OGA, WAV, WMA, AMR, AWB, FLAC, MID, MIDI, XMF, MXMF, IMY, RTTTL, RTX, OTA

  • Audio Codecs: MP3, AMR-NB, AMR-WB, AAC, AAC+, eAAC+, WMA, Vorbis, FLAC 

    Video Files:

  • Video Output: MP4, M4V, 3GP, 3G2, WMV, ASF, AVI, FLV, MKV, WEBM

  • Playback Format: H.263, H.264 (AVC), MPEG4, VC-1, Sorenson Spark, MP43, WMV7, WMV8, VP8 

    Image Files:

  • A-GIF, BMP, GIF, JPEG, P-JPEG, PNG, WBMP 

    Document Files:

  • Word File: .doc, .docx, .txt, .hwp, .rtf

  • Excel File: .xls .xlsx .csv

  • PowerPoint: .ppt .pptx .pps

  • PDF: .pdf
productList.productMetaDescription: GiftStarter's group gifting platform makes it easy to gift the Samsung 16GB Galaxy Tab S Multi-Touch 10.5&quot; Wi-Fi Tablet-Dazzling White.

productList.productName: Nintendo 3DS XL Handheld Gaming System (2015 Version, Black)
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • Face-Tracking 3D

  • Compatible with Most DS Games

  • Access to the Nintendo eShop

  • 88" Top 3D Widescreen LCD Display

  • 18" Bottom LCD Touchscreen

  • Wireless Connectivity for Multiplayer

  • MicroSDHC Media Card Slot

  • Built-in amiibo Support

  • C-Stick, ZL & ZR Buttons

  • Includes Stylus & 4GB SDHC Card




 


 


Achieve total immersion with dual large screens and 3D graphics with the black 2015 version of the 3DS XL Handheld Gaming System from Nintendo. The Nintendo 3DS is compatible with all 3DS and eShop games, as well as most DS and DSi games. Also, certain future releases will only be available on this Nintendo 3DS XL 2015 model. Designed for the family, the Nintendo 3DS XL has a 3D depth slider, a 3D camera, face-tracking 3D capabilities, StreetPass, SpotPass, wireless connectivity, and even access to the Miiverse online community.


Note: AC Adapter is not included. You can use any Nintendo 3DS, 2DS, 3DS XL, or DSi charger with the new Nintendo 3DS XL.


Face-Tracking 3D


The face-tracking feature uses the system's inner cameras to adjust images based on your viewing angle, so you can enjoy total immersion in your games.


Improved Controls


The C stick brings added control possibilities (like intuitive camera control) to compatible games. And the added ZL and ZR buttons give you more options than before.


Built-in amiibo Support


Tap an amiibo figure to the near-field communication (NFC) reader on the lower screen to enjoy amiibo features in compatible games. Get bonus items and content, customize your character, and more when you use amiibo figures (like Mario) with amiibo-compatible games.


More Power


Improved CPU performance means faster loading times, so you spend more time playing. Many games will look and play better and several upcoming games will be built from the ground up to take advantage of this power boost.


Play More Games


You can still play all Nintendo 3DS games and nearly all games from previous systems such as Nintendo DS and DSi. And, some future titles will be exclusively playable on this 2015 version of Nintendo 3DS XL.


Data Sharing


You can transfer your photos, music, and other files between a PC and your system's microSDHC card via a wireless network. No need to remove the microSDHC card.


Improved Web Browsing


The improved Internet browser lets you watch videos and surf the Web with ease. You can even use the ZL/ZR buttons to switch tabs or zoom in with the C stick. You can browse the web right from your 3DS XL from anywhere with a wireless Wi-Fi network. You can pause your game at any point to search a website for game hints or catch up with email and news.


Improved Camera


Enjoy improved results when you take photos in low-light situations.


3D Screen


The Nintendo 3DS XL system features a stereoscopic 3D display on the top screen to give objects within the game world a feeling of space and depth. It becomes easier to see the position of characters and obstacles, making many game experiences even more intuitive for all types of players.


3D Depth Slider


A built-in 3D Depth Slider allows you to adjust the intensity of the 3D settings on the Nintendo 3DS XL system to your preference. The 3D effect can also be turned down completely. All Nintendo 3DS games and applications can also be played in 2D.


3D Camera


The Nintendo 3DS XL system can take photos in 3D, thanks to the two outward-facing lenses. Capture eye-popping images of your friends and family, have fun with filters like the Merge lens, or even use the system's AR technology and included AR Cards to make Mii characters and Nintendo heroes appear in the real world with you. You can share your 3D photos with others by submitting them to the Nintendo 3DS Photo Showcase. Browse featured galleries or submit your own masterpiece to the Showcase. In a creative mood? You can record your own 3D videos, or 3D stop-motion animation using the built-in 3D camera.


Motion Sensor & Gyro Sensor


Portable play controls allow for unique gameplay mechanics. A built-in motion sensor and gyro sensor can react to the motion and tilt of the system, so whether players are twisting their systems side to side or moving them up and down, their motion-compatible Nintendo 3DS games respond instantly.


Analog Control


With the Circle Pad, located above the D-pad, the Nintendo 3DS XL offers full analog control. Combined with the touchscreen, traditional buttons, camera and microphone input, and advanced motion control of the Motion Sensor and Gyro Sensor, the Nintendo 3DS XL provides a variety of ways to interact and play.


Stylus


The Nintendo 3DS XL comes with a Stylus to allow for precise touch controls on the bottom screen.


Two Screens


On the Nintendo 3DS XL, a widescreen display on the top screen shows an 800 x 240 pixel resolution, allocating 400 pixels for each eye to create the 3D effect. The bottom LCD touch screen operates at a 320 x 240 resolution. Both screens are capable of displaying a brilliant 16.77 million colors.


SD Memory Card Included


The Nintendo 3DS XL comes packed with a 4GB SD memory card. You can use this SD memory card to store your 3D photos, sound recordings created on the system, and music from your PC. You can also use it to store games downloaded from the Nintendo eShop. The Nintendo 3DS XL features SDHC card compatibility to increase your storage space even further.


Backwards Compatibility


Almost all existing Nintendo DS and Nintendo DSi games can be played on the Nintendo 3DS family of systems in 2D. With backwards compatibility, your existing portable games look and play just as well. If you've downloaded Nintendo DSiWare games and applications on your Nintendo DSi system, you can transfer most of those games to the Nintendo 3DS XL. You can also transfer downloaded software, sounds, and images between systems in the Nintendo 3DS family. Some games cannot be transferred. See the full list on Nintendo's official website. 

Nintendo DS and Nintendo DSi games will be displayed in 2D graphics. 
Select Nintendo DS games that use accessories in the Game Boy Advance slot of the Nintendo DS system are not compatible with the Nintendo 3DS XL. 
Flipnote Studio cannot be transferred to the Nintendo 3DS XL. Nintendo will be developing a similar application for the Nintendo 3DS XL. 
A system update may be required for some features.


Mii Maker


After choosing just a few basic settings, take a photo of yourself or a friend with the built-in camera, and let the Mii Maker application automatically generate your Mii character. Then make any final adjustments and your Mii is ready.


Miiverse


Miiverse is an online community available directly from your Nintendo 3DS XL system. It lets you chat with other fans about your favorite games, share your accomplishments, or give tips to other players. You can post typed messages, screenshots from compatible games, or even your own drawings. Access Miiverse at any time from the Home menu on your Nintendo 3DS XL.


StreetPass Mii Plaza


Meet and play with Mii characters created by other gamers. Simply carry your system with you in Sleep Mode and it'll collect Mii information and send yours when you pass other players in the street. When you visit StreetPass Mii Plaza, you'll see the Mii characters you've collected.


Nintendo Zone


Bring your Nintendo 3DS XL to any of over 29,000 locations to receive an automatic and free connection to Wi-Fi. Once connected, discover Nintendo Zone, where you can watch 3D videos, full length animations and sports highlights, play demos and trivia challenges, find retailer promotions and coupons, and more. To get started, tap the blinking Nintendo Zone icon on the HOME Menu of your system.


Nintendo eShop


The Nintendo eShop is the digital store for the Nintendo 3DS XL. It's a one-stop shop for a range of content that is downloadable right to your system. Discover software such as original Nintendo games, portable Virtual Console games, and more than 350 Nintendo DSiWare games. You can also view video game trailers, screenshots, and info for downloadable and retail games.


Nintendo 3DS Sound


The Nintendo 3DS Sound application lets you listen to your favorite music saved on an SD card in MP3 or AAC format. You can even record and play with sounds via your system's microphone with a variety of fun filters.


Included Games


AR Games uses the outer cameras and AR Cards included with the Nintendo 3DS XL to present an augmented-reality gaming experience. Just place one of the AR Cards on a table or floor, and the camera will read the card and initiate game stages or characters right before your eyes. AR Games features different modes, from a wild shooting gallery to an interactive photo shoot with your Mii characters and more.


Activity Log


The Activity Log tracks both your game play activity, noting which games you've played and how long you've played them, as well as your physical activity, counting every step you take while carrying your system. Track your data by day, week, month, or year and walk more every day to earn Play Coins, which can be used with compatible games and applications to acquire special content and a variety of other benefits.


SpotPass


The SpotPass feature allows the Nintendo 3DS XL to automatically communicate with a nearby wireless LAN access point, enabling it to connect to the Internet and transmit a variety of data, such as free software, photos and videos, notifications, system updates, and other information.


Included Software



  • AR Games

  • Face Raiders

  • Mii Maker

  • StreetPass Mii Plaza

  • Activity Log

  • Nintendo eShop

  • Nintendo 3DS Browser

  • Nintendo 3DS Camera

  • Nintendo 3DS Sound
productList.productMetaDescription: The new Nintendo 3DS XL Handheld Gaming System is the perfect group gift for the gamer on-the-go.

productList.productName: Sony PlayStation 4 Four Games, One Pick Bundle
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • AMD Radeon Graphics Core Next Engine

  • 8GB of GDDR5 RAM, 500GB Hard Drive

  • AMD Jaguar Eight-Core Processor

  • 10/100/1000 Mbps Gigabit Ethernet

  • 11b/g/n Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 2.1+EDR

  • Blu-ray Disc Player

  • DualShock 4 Wireless Controller

  • Remote Play with PlayStation Vita

  • PlayStation Plus Membership Support

  • One Game Voucher for Digital Download


 


Get the next generation gaming experience with this Sony PlayStation 4 Four Games, One Pick Bundle. In addition to the PlayStation console and a DualShock 4 wireless controller, you'll get one game voucher for digital download. Choose between Destiny, NBA 2K15, LittleBigPlanet 3, or Far Cry 4. All four games vary in ratings so please check before you choose one.


Please note that you will only be able to choose ONE of the four games. It will be provided in the form of a game voucher for digital download. Internet access will be required to download the game you choose.


The Sony PlayStation 4 Gaming Console ushers in an era of next generation gaming. Providing dynamic and connected gaming, powerful performance, high definition graphics, deeply integrated social capabilities, and innovative second-screen features, the PlayStation 4 allows you to game as you see fit. With immersive game play, access to your favorite digital entertainment apps, and PlayStation exclusives, the PlayStation 4 centers around you, the gamer. Play when, where, and how you want.


Broadband Internet required to download game using the included Download Voucher. Users are responsible for broadband access and usage fees. Additional charges can apply for online content. There may be mandatory in-game updates which users must download to continue playing.


1.84 Teraflops of PlayStation 4 Graphics


The PlayStation's graphics processing unit (GPU) contains a unified array of 18 Compute Units, which collectively generate 1.84 teraflops of processing power that can be applied freely to graphics, simulation tasks, or a mixture of the two. The PlayStation 4 is also equipped with 8GB of unified system memory, easing game creation and increasing the richness of content achievable. High-speed GDDR5 is used for the memory, giving the system a total of 176 GB/s of bandwidth and providing a further boost to graphics performance.


Personalized, Curated Content


The PlayStation 4 has the ability to learn your preferences. It will gauge your likes and dislikes and suggest content to match them. This allows you to discover content specifically tailored to you. It can even download and install content on your console. Search for games in your favorite genres or by your favorite game developers. You can also look over game-related information shared by your friends, view your friends' gameplay, or get recommendations for content, such as games, TV shows, and movies.


Play as You Download


Spend less time waiting and more time playing with the PlayStation 4. When you purchase a game that is enabled with this feature, the PlayStation 4 downloads the core content so you can start playing as soon as possible. While you're playing, the PlayStation 4 downloads the rest of the game in the background.


Remote Play


Remote Play on the PlayStation 4 fully unlocks the PlayStation Vita's potential, making it the ultimate companion device. With the PlayStation Vita, you will be able to play a range of PlayStation 4 titles on the PlayStation Vita's 5" display over a Wi-Fi network. The PlayStation Vita is sold separately.


PlayStation App


The PlayStation App will enable iOS and Android smartphones and tablets to become second screens for the PlayStation 4. Once installed on these devices, players can view in game items, purchase PlayStation 4 games, download PlayStation 4 games directly to the console at home, and even watch the gameplay of other gamers remotely.


DualShock 4 Wireless Controller


The included DualShock 4 wireless controller features familiar controls from its predecessor, the DualShock 3, while also introducing innovative ways to interact with games and other players. Improved dual analog sticks and trigger buttons offer precise control while the capacitive touch pad provides a unique way of interacting with games. The Share button allows you to share your gameplay over social media.


PlayStation Plus


While PlayStation Plus is not required for services such as Netflix, or sharing gameplay via the Share button, it does provide additional features to enhance your PlayStation 4 experience. The most important feature of PlayStation Plus is your ability to play online multiplayer. If you do not have a PlayStation Plus membership, you will not be able play online. PlayStation Plus also provides exclusive access to a regular, curated selection of titles at no additional cost known as the Instant Game Collection. 

In addition to free monthly games, PlayStation Plus members also get regular discounts in the PlayStation Store. PlayStation Plus also provides members with the ability to automatically (or manually) upload game save files to the Online Game Save Storage for safekeeping. PlayStation Plus members will have up to 1GB of cloud storage to allocate their PlayStation 4 save files. Other benefits of having a PlayStation Plus membership include early access to exclusive game content, automatic game patch downloads and installations, and more. 

Please note that a PlayStation Plus membership is required for online multiplayer. It is not included with the PlayStation 4 and must be purchased separately.
productList.productMetaDescription: The Sony PlayStation 4 Four Games, One Pick Bundle, is an awesome group gift idea for the gamer that will appreciate starting off their new console with a digital download voucher to choose from 4 popular games- Destiny, NBA 2K15, LittleBigPlanet 3, or Far Cry 4.

productList.productName: Dropcam Pro Cloud-Based Wi-Fi Monitoring System
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • Cloud-Based Video Monitoring

  • Easy Camera & Wi-Fi Setup

  • Remote Surveillance, with Two-Way Talk

  • 130° Angle of View, 8x Digital Zoom

  • 720p HD Surveillance Footage

  • IR LEDs Provide Images in the Dark

  • Mobile & Web Apps

  • Event Detection & Scheduling

  • Optional Cloud-Based Recording


 


The Dropcam Pro Cloud-Based Wi-Fi Monitoring System is an easy to set up streaming indoor HD camera with two-way audio that serves as a baby monitor, surveillance camera, or a way to stay connected with loved ones when away from home. The Dropcam Pro features improvements over the original Dropcam, while still being just as easy to set up and use. It streams 720p video to the cloud using over your WiFi network, allowing you to view the live video stream from the camera from your mobile device or computer from anywhere you can get an internet connection. The two-way talk feature allows you to hear and speak to whoever is near the camera.

The camera features a 130° angle of view so you can see more of the room, and the 8x digital zoom lets you close in on what is happening. The camera streams HD video at 720p using the H.264 codec for excellent video quality with minimum data usage. When the lights are out the built-in IR emitters provide illumination for the camera, so you can still see images in the dark. Dropcam provides free mobile device and web apps for viewing and controling the camera system. The Dropcam Pro can be set up to deliver alerts on motion/event detection, and you can create a schedule of on off times for the system. Dropcam also provides a paid optional cloud based recording system, so you can record what you've missed.


Easy Setup


The Dropcam Pro sets up quickly, set up a complimentary account at Dropcam, connect the camera to your computer via the included USB cable, or connect wirelessly to your iOS device. Once the camera has been registered to your account, you use the USB cable and AC adapter to power the camera, there is no need for a direct connection to the computer.


Wi-Fi


The camera connects to your Wi-Fi network and streams the video to the cloud, Dropcam servers, which then seamlessly allow you and anyone you allow access to the live video feed.


IR


The Dropcam Pro incorporates IR LED emitters that allow you to see an image up to 30 feet away from the camera, even in complete darkness.


Two-Way Talk


The camera features a built-in mic and speaker, so you can carry on a conversation with whomever is near the camera. This allows you to see what your family is doing and talk with them, while you are away from home.


Control



  • You can schedule your camera to automatically turn on and off at specified times during the day or week.

  • You can set up event alert, that take a snapshot and alerts you via email or your mobile device when a motion event happens

  • You can turn the IR emitters on/off or leave them on automatic.


Optional Cloud Based Recording


An available monthly cloud based recording plans allows you to record up to 30 days of video. You can save and share clips across the web and even download them to your computer.
productList.productMetaDescription: Rally the troops to group gift the Dropcam Pro Cloud-Based Wi-Fi Monitoring System, which provides home security and peace of mind.

productList.productName: ASUS ROG G20AJ-US009S Gaming Desktop Computer
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • 6 GHz Intel Core i7-4790 Quad-Core

  • 8GB of 1600 MHz DDR3 RAM

  • 1TB 7200 rpm HDD + 8GB SSD Cache

  • NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB)

  • HDMI / DisplayPort / DVI-I / DVI-D

  • Slim Tray SuperMulti DVD Burner

  • Gigabit Ethernet & 802.11ac Wi-Fi

  • 5-Liter Case

  • USB Keyboard & Mouse Included

  • Windows 8.1 (64-bit)


The ROG G20AJ-US009S Gaming Desktop Computer from ASUS is a small form factor system that is designed for those who require reliability and is powered by a 4th generation 3.6 GHz Intel Core i7-4790 Quad-Core (Haswell) processor, allowing you to run multiple applications simultaneously. If you need more power, the processor can be overclocked to 4.0 GHz and the 8GB of 1600 MHz DDR3 RAM can be upgraded to 16GB.

For long term storage of your files, a 1TB 7200 rpm 3.5" SATA hard drive provides ample space to hold your data. Additionally, this drive is outfitted with 8GB of SSD cache memory that the system uses to quickly access frequently-used files and programs. The NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 graphics card is designed to deliver a sharp, clear picture, while allowing for a wide range of monitors to be used via its one DisplayPort, one HDMI port, one Dual Link DVI-I port, and one Dual Link DVI-D port. If you require extra displays, the GTX 760 can support up to four simultaneous monitors. Whether you are listening to music, watching a movie, or playing a game, the integrated SonicMaster audio controller outputs 8-channel audio, which allows for higher fidelity than standard controllers.

If you would like to connect external peripherals to your computer, such as memory card readers or optical drives, the ROG G20AJ has four USB 3.0 ports and four USB 2.0 ports. Internet connectivity may be achieved using either the Gigabit Ethernet or the 802.11a/b/g/n/ac Wi-Fi. In order to handle the system's increased energy demands, the ROG G20 also features dual power supplies that independently operate at 230W and 180W. Also included with this workstation are a wired USB keyboard and mouse, an AC adapter, and a power cord.


ASUS ROG G20AJ


12.5-liter Case


Despite its 12.5-liter size, the G20 performs as you'd expect from a hardcore gaming system, despite it being of a small form factor


4th Generation Intel Core i7 Processor


Under the hood, the ROG G20 is powered by a 4th generation Intel Core i7 processor to give you advanced levels of gaming and multitasking performance. The G20 gives you the power to take on demanding of tasks, allowing you to play games at their highest settings, watch videos in 4K UHD, and even create awesome websites and 3D models for work.


NVIDIA GeForce GTX Graphics


Experience intense visuals with the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 graphics, powered by 2GB of GDDR5 RAM. The ROG G20 draws you into a world of colors and visuals in WQHD 2560 x 1440 resolution, letting you play games at their highest settings. The G20 even gives you an added dimension to gaming with NVIDIA 3D Vision Surround bringing a fully immersive, stereoscopic 3D experience to you


SSD Cache


The ROG G20's SSD cache accelerates data access, resulting in a faster and more responsive system. SSDs are also more reliable and longer-lasting than mechanical hard drives


Slim Tray SuperMulti DVD Burner


Dual layer read and write support for CD-R, CD-RW, DVD±R, DVD±RW, and DVD-RAM, among other formats


Customizable Lighting Effects with 8 Million Colors


The ROG G20 has a design that features a matte-black finish, strong lines and Mayan-inspired markings. Customizable lighting effects showcase up to 8 million colors across the chassis


SonicMaster-optimized Gaming Audio


Through a mix of hardware and audio tuning software, SonicMaster brings you right into the fight. Gunshots ring out, explosions reverberate, and even footsteps become auditory cues on the digital battlefield, allowing you to be immersed. The ROG's AudioWizard sound processing provides ROG Desktops with an additional layer of audio enhancement, with up to five customizable modes you can switch on-the-fly


Aegis Performance Monitoring


This ASUS Aegis application lets you monitor the performance of your ROG G20 through a user-friendly interface. Aegis lets you track CPU and memory usage, as well as your network download and upload status. You can even set temperature and voltage thresholds and leave the system to maintain them automatically. Aegis provides you with a way to manage your system


Intel Gigabit Ethernet with GameFirst II


Intel Gigabit Ethernet both lowers demands on the processor and improves connection stability. Adding more lag-reducing support is ROG's GameFirst II with cFosSpeed traffic-shaping technology. Revamped to display an even more intuitive user interface, GameFirst II's EZ Mode allows beginners to lower lag with no expert knowledge, while the Advanced Mode allows hardcore tweakers to take full control. Either way, the ROG G20 offers latency that's up to eight times lower than standard Ethernet, even when handling heavy network traffic


Heat Management


The ROG G20 is designed with no visible exterior side exhaust vents in order to keep the chassis' neat, clean lines. The ROG G20 has a thermal design that takes advantage of natural convection, with a hidden airflow channel that ensures efficient heat management. Two internal fans further enhance heat dissipation, making ROG G20 a good choice for marathon gaming sessions


Efficient and Quiet


The G20 is energy-efficient. In Eco Energy Mode, its ultra-low power design draws as little as 20W at idle - so you won't be racking up huge electricity bills when you leave G20 on overnight to download games. It can also function as your home server with Intel Ready Mode technology, drawing only 10W even when it's connected to the Internet, which is as much electricity as a low-power light bulb. On top of that, it runs quiet at just 22 dB when idle


Connectivity


The ROG G20 Gaming Desktop features a total of eight front and rear USB ports, so there's always a port available for all sorts of gaming peripherals. Hook the ROG G20 up to an HDTV through an HDMI connection for large screen entertainment and gaming too.

Fast and stable 802.11ac Wi-Fi provides strong signal delivery and up to three times the speed of previous Wi-Fi standards so you can play online games or stream videos smoothly. Built-in Bluetooth 4.0 conveniently connects the ROG G20 to most Bluetooth devices for a complete home PC experience.

ASUS storage innovations also mean that your data is kept within reach. The ROG G20 comes with 100GB of ASUS WebStorage space free, so you can keep safely store and access your cloud-based data anywhere as long as you have an Internet connection. You can also share photos and videos with your family and friends through a secure URL link


RAM Expandable up to 16GB


The system's built in 8GB of RAM is expandable up to 16GB


Windows 8.1


The Return of the Start Button


After many requests from Windows users, the Start button makes its triumphant return in Windows 8.1. While it may not be exactly the same as its predecessor in Windows 7, the Start button has two core functions. A left click on the Start button will take you to the Windows 8.1 Start screen featuring live tiles. A right click on the Start button brings up an advanced menu where you can access the Device Manager, Control Panel, Network options, and more


Boot Directly to the Desktop


Windows 8.1 gives you the choice of booting to the Windows 8.1 Start screen with live tiles or booting to the familiar desktop screen of Windows 7. Users can also boot directly into an app or app view if they choose to


Seamless Integration of Multi-Touch Gestures


Windows 8.1 supports multi-touch gestures. Now, you can use your keyboard, mouse or the touchpad using simple gestures. Whether you're browsing apps, reading a book or typing on the go with touch, you'll be able to seamlessly switch between all three interactive components. With the touchpad, Windows 8.1 allows you to use multi-touch gestures, such as swipe, drag, tap, slide, pinch-to-zoom, and more


To the Cloud


With Windows 8.1, when signed in using your Microsoft account, you'll have instant access to your personal Start screen, themes, language preferences, browsing history, and browser favorites. You can also connect to services such as Microsoft Outlook, Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter, and more


Windows Store


In the Windows Store, you can search for or browse thousands of apps. Choose from the featured apps or grab one of the most frequently downloaded apps to see what all the hype is all about. You can also see how other people rate apps. For certain apps, you can try it out before you purchase it


Intel Dual-Band 802.11ac Wi-Fi


Featuring Intel Dual-Band 802.11ac Wi-Fi, the ASUS ROG G20AJ delivers high performance, broader coverage, and longer battery life. The ASUS ROG G20AJ is also backwards compatible with 802.11a/b/g/n Wi-Fi networks. The ASUS ROG G20AJ also comes with Bluetooth 4.0 technology so you'll be able to wirelessly connect to Bluetooth-compatible peripherals and accessories
productList.productMetaDescription: This incredible desktop gaming rig is a great group gift idea for the PC gamer that has been longing for a hardware refresh.

productList.productName: Fujitsu ScanSnap iX100 Wireless Mobile Scanner
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • Optical Resolution: 600 dpi

  • Maximum Document Size: 8.5 x 34"

  • Minimum Document Size: 1 x 1"

  • Scan Speed: 5.2 Seconds per Page

  • Dual Scan Mode

  • Automatic Stitching of Two-Page Spread

  • Warm-Up Time: <2 Seconds from Ready

  • USB Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery

  • Battery Life: 260 Scans

  • USB 2.0 and Wi-Fi Connectivity


 


The battery-powered ScanSnap iX100 Wireless Mobile Scanner from Fujitsu provides users with a Wi-Fi capable portable scanning solution for working almost anywhere. The iX100 features an optical resolution of 600 dpi for detailed image capture and can work with documents from 1 x 1" all the way to 8.5 x 34" in size. Speed is also not an issue with the ability to scan a document in just 5.2 seconds at up to 300 dpi. 

The unit's wireless connectivity enables scanning over a network to computers or mobile devices running the ScanSnap Connect application. It can also detect networks and automatically connect to commonly visited networks once initially set up. A Direct Connect mode then allows users to scan wirelessly without an infrastructure network. 

Other modes include a Dual Scan feature that will scan two smaller documents simultaneously, and automatic stitching of a two-page spread. Warm-up time is fast at <2 seconds from Ready and the USB-rechargeable Li-ion battery will provide up to 260 scans from a single charge. Additionally, the iX100 has USB 2.0 connectivity for direct connection to a computer and scanning.



  • Automatic detection of color or black & white as well as correction for skew and orientation with blank pages removed

  • Straight paper path allows for scanning of thicker documents like plastic credit cards

  • Continuous Document Feeding function permits users to insert pages one after another for rapid scanning

  • Quick Menu offers the ability to quickly change settings for different jobs such as scan to folder, email, print, mobile, or a variety of cloud services and applications

  • Scan to mobile devices and computers, including Windows, Mac, iOS, Android, and Kindle devices, with the ScanSnap Connect application

  • Scan directly to cloud services like Dropbox, Evernote, Google Docs, SugarSync, Salesforce Chatter, and SharePoint Online

  • ScanSnap folder can act as a host folder for transmitting scans directly to your favorite applications

  • ScanSnap Manager V6.3 driver is included along with ScanSnap Organizer V5.2 (V1.1 for Mac OS), CardMinder V5.2, ABBYY FineReader for ScanSnap 5.0, and Scan to Microsoft SharePoint
productList.productMetaDescription: The Fujitsu ScanSnap iX100 is an awesome gift that friends and family can give to anyone that wants the convenience of mobile wireless scanning.

productList.productName: Dell Alienware Area-51 A51R2-1172SLV Gaming Desktop
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • 3 GHz Intel Core i7-5820K (Broadwell)

  • 8GB of DDR4 RAM

  • 2TB 7200 rpm Hard Drive

  • NVIDIA Geforce GTX 980 Graphics (4GB)

  • DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI

  • Slot-Loading SuperMulti DVD Burner

  • Gigabit Ethernet, 802.11ac

  • Liquid Cooling, Bluetooth 4.0

  • Alienware Multimedia Keyboard & Mouse

  • Windows 8.1 (64-bit)


 


The Dell Alienware Area-51 A51R2-1172SLV Gaming Desktop features a triangular case that allows easy access to all the ports and provides efficient cooling for the internal components by offering a large space for hot air to escape. This desktop computer is outfitted with the 5th generation Broadwell 3.3 GHz Intel Core i7-i7-5820K processor that comes with 15MB of L3 cache memory and six cores, which allows for greater multi-tasking capabilities. It comes equipped with 8GB of DDR4 memory to help you run multiple applications and can also support up to 32GB when applications require more. Windows 8.1 is pre-installed on the 2TB 7200 rpm hard drive that still offers enough space to store all your important files, photos, videos, and more. 

Experience lag-free gameplay and smooth 1080p video playback with the NVIDIA Geforce GTX 980 graphics card with 4GB of video memory. This graphics card supports multiple monitors and offers HDMI, DisplayPort, and DVI ports for immersing you when gaming or working. For connectivity, this desktop provides Gigabit Ethernet, 802.11ac, Bluetooth 4.0, four USB 2.0, and six USB 3.0 ports as well as a plethora of audio ports that are powered by Creative Sound Core 3D audio technology. Furthermore, you can save and transfer data using the memory card reader or the slot-loading DVD burner.


Triad Chassis


Pivot and Light 
The Area-51's three corners are built to support 5 times the system's weight. Pivot the system towards you and gain easy access to the rear ports when connecting or disconnecting cables. There is even a button on the back of the chassis that turns on the rear accessibility lighting to help you see. 

Carry On 
The rugged handles make the Area-51 more natural to carry. The shape and internal component layout are designed to have a low center of gravity to avoid the system from tipping when being lifted. 

Easy Access 
The angular shape is designed to have all the I/O ports facing you directly, making connecting a USB device, headphones, or even a media card reader easier than on a traditional rectangular chassis design.


Designed to Keep Cool


Internal fans blow fresh ambient air, quietly, and directly onto the graphics card. The internal cable management system enables maximum airflow - satisfying your system's hunger for cooler air and keeping it performing at its peak. The angled design also provides a large space for hot air to escape where a traditional rectangular chassis only leaves a small space between it and the wall.


Processing Power


The Alienware Area-51 ushers in performance with Windows 8.1 and a 6-core Intel Core i7 processor. The Intel X99 Express chipset supports 2133 MHz DDR4 memory - up to 32GB in quad channel. In addition, the processor is liquid cooled, allowing it to be easily overclocked.


Big Storage


The storage bays support up to five drives of either SSD or HDD. Enjoy the pure speed of solid state and the big storage of hard drives - allowing for quick boot and massive archiving capabilities.


Connect with Confidence


The Ethernet assembly has been built by Killer Technology. It prioritizes streaming video and gaming packets for the smoothest possible performance when you need it most. Plus, it comes fully equipped with 802.11ac - the latest wireless protocol.


Alienware Command Center 4.0


AlienFX 
Customize your lighting experience with AlienFX that provides nine independent programmable lighting zones. You can create up to 512 trillion color combos with over 20 colors to choose from. 
Alien Adrenaline 
The Alien Adrenaline performance monitoring app lets you view detailed graphs that tell you real-time details about the CPU, memory, graphics card, and network adapter. 
Overclocking Controls 
Manually tinker with the settings of your CPU to raise performance even beyond the stock settings. 
Manual DRAM Adjustments 
Optimize the memory for maximum performance and ensure that your system runs at peak power while gaming. 
Overclocking Profile 
Enhance your gaming features and squeeze as much power as possible by adjusting the system's settings. 
Thermal Controls 
Alienware's Thermal Controls allow you to control the thermal and venting behavior of your Area-51. You can also create and save multiple thermal and venting profiles for different usage scenarios.

productList.productName: Elgato Systems Game Capture HD High Definition Game Recorder
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • For PS3, PS4, Xbox 360 and Xbox One

  • Record Gameplay to a Mac or PC

  • Advanced H.264 Encoding

  • HDMI Pass-Through to TV

  • Flashback Recording Feature

  • Share on YouTube, Facebook & Twitter


 


With the Game Capture HD High Definition Game Recorder from Elgato, you can relive your greatest gaming moments time and time again and even share with friends and fans. That's because the Game Capture HD lets you record PS3/PS4 or Xbox 360/Xbox One gameplay to a Mac or PC.

Advanced hardware H.264 encoding lets you capture in HD yet keeps the file size small. Gameplay is passed through to your TV via HDMI. With direct input, you can use a single cable to connect the recorder to your console, eliminating a tangle of cables in your entertainment area.

Along with the recorder, you also get software that makes it easy to capture every move you make, even if you forget to press the record button. The software also lets you trim your gaming scenes and pass them on to your favorite editing software. The Flashback Recording feature lets you timeshift your gameplay -- that means retroactively hitting the record button on your computer. And with a single click, you can share your gameplay on YouTube, Facebook and Twitter.



  • Record your PS4, PS3, Xbox 360, or Xbox One gameplay to a Mac or PC

  • Advanced H.264 encoding

  • HDMI pass-through to your TV

  • Direct input for your Xbox One, Xbox 360, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 3.

  • Flashback Recording feature lets you record retroactively

  • One-click sharing to YouTube, Facebook and Twitter
productList.productMetaDescription: The Elgato Systems Game Capture HD Game Recorder is a perfect group gift idea for gamers that love to record and share gaming moments.
